bibl.title: Gioielli e papiri. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Demonstrates how comparing archaeological with papyrological data can be useful in different ways in order to have a better knowledge of ancient jewels and jewelled people.

bibl.title: Oggetti-simbolo: produzione, uso e significato nel mondo antico

bibl.seg: RUSSO Simona, Gioielli e papiri. Avec résumé en anglais.
Isabella BALDINI LIPPOLIS e Anna Lina MORELLI (a cura di), Oggetti-simbolo: produzione, uso e significato nel mondo antico = Ornamenta. 3 (Bologna, 2011) pp. 29-39, 1 fig. coul.
Demonstrates how comparing archaeological with papyrological data can be useful in different ways in order to have a better knowledge of ancient jewels and jewelled people.
